Package io.honeycomb.libhoney.transport.impl

Class BatchingHttpTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.honeycomb.libhoney.transport.impl.BatchingHttpTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transport, AutoCloseable

    public class BatchingHttpTransport
extends Object
implements Transport
    The default Transport used by the SDK. Batches incoming events

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        public boolean submit​(ResolvedEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: Transport
        Submit an event to HoneyComb via the Transport. The Transport may reject the event if its internal bounded buffer has overflowed.
        Specified by:
        submit in interface Transport
        Parameters:
        event - the resolved event containing its final data
        Returns:
        whether the event was accepted by the transport
        See Also:
        ClientRejected.RejectionReason.QUEUE_OVERFLOW

      • getResponseObservable

        public ResponseObservable getResponseObservable​()
        Description copied from interface: Transport
        Get the ResponseObservable that is linked to this Transport. Can be used to register an ResponseObserver for inspection of the event responses.
        Specified by:
        getResponseObservable in interface Transport
        Returns:
        the response observable

      • init

        public static BatchingHttpTransport init​(TransportOptions options)

      • init

        public static BatchingHttpTransport init​(TransportOptions options,
                                         JsonSerializer<List<HoneycombBatchConsumer.BatchRequestElement>> batchRequestSerializer)
        Construct a BatchingHttpTransport while overriding the JsonSerializer used by the transport to convert batches of events into HTTP requests. This is an option for advanced user who want more fine-grained control over JSON serialization. For instance, the user may want to exploit Jackson POJO annotations.
        Parameters:
        options - the transport options
        batchRequestSerializer - for serializing event batches to JSON
        Returns:
        the transport
